title: Countries with the lowest inflation rate 2019
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Inflation rate compared to previous year in the y axis.
The Inflation rate compared to previous year is highest at Country Eritrea and lowest at Country Panama.
The difference of Inflation rate compared to previous year between the highest and lowest Country is 27.59.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Inflation rate compared to previous year for 20 number of Countrys.
The maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year 27.6 is found at Country Eritrea and the minimum is found at Panama where Country is 0.01.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Inflation rate compared to previous year in the y axis.
The Inflation rate compared to previous year is highest at Country Eritrea and lowest at Country Panama.
The difference of Inflation rate compared to previous year between the highest and lowest Country is 27.59.
max_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Inflation rate compared to previous year in each Country on the y axis.
Country Eritrea has the highest Inflation rate compared to previous year and Panama has the lowest Inflation rate compared to previous year.
Country Guinea-Bissau has the second highest value for Inflation rate compared to previous year.
The difference of Inflation rate compared to previous year between the highest and lowest Country is 27.59.
Inflation rate compared to previous year at Country Eritrea is 27.6 , second place is Guinea-Bissau at 2.58, and thirdly is United Arab Emirates at 1.5.
Similar Inflation rate compared to previous year is found in Country Switzerland, and Marshall Islands.
The average Inflation rate compared to previous year in all 20 Countrys is 1.97.
